events.title: Community Clean-Up Day
events.description: Join us for a community clean-up event to help keep our neighborhood beautiful. Supplies will be provided.

events.title: Farmers Market
events.description: Support local farmers and artisans at our weekly farmers market. Fresh produce, handmade goods, and more!

events.title: Outdoor Movie Night
events.description: Bring your blankets and chairs for a fun outdoor movie night under the stars. Movie starts at dusk.

events.title: Art Exhibition
events.description: Explore the vibrant works of local artists at this one-day art exhibition.
